Not Found.title: Not Found
Not Found.message: The page or resource you have requested was not found on our server.

tooBusy: The server is temporary very busy and could not process your request. Please try again in a few moment.

Internal Server Error.title: Internal Server Error
Internal Server Error.message: We are sorry but something went wrong on our server while processing your request. Kindly try again after a while or please let us know the details of your action.

csrf_token_error.message: The server could not validate your request. Please try again or contact our support.

Forbidden.title: Forbidden
Forbidden.message: You are not allowed to access this area or you are not authenticated as a right user.

Bad Request.title: Bad Request
Bad Request.message: Processing your request was aborted because some of data you sent was incorrect.

Too Many Requests.title: Too Many Requests
Too Many Requests.message: You have exceeded your request limit. Please try again after a while.

Locked.title: Locked
Locked.message: The resource you requested is not accessible because it is locked,

Unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
Unauthorized.message: You need to be authorized to access this resource.

Unprocessable Entity.title: Unprocessable Entity
Unprocessable Entity.message: Something is wrong with your request so we rejected to process it.

missingRequiredData: Processing your request was aborted because some of required data was missing.
invalidData: Your request data is not suitable for this endpoint.
